body: Job description:・Provide computer-based Online English tutorial lessons to students worldwide through Skype. ・Always SMILE!・Deal with foreign students with different English levels and from different age groups.Requirements:YOU HAVE TO HAVE A GMAIL ACCOUNT FOR THIS JOB.Male/Female: at least 18 years old (university student/university graduate)Required skill: ・Capable of communicating using the English language・Computer literate・Has high-speed Internet connection at home (at least 1.0 Mbps for Upload)・Can handle pressure very well・This is a Home-based teaching position, so applicants must be willing to work at home in a quiet teaching environment.・Willing to accept changes of company’s featuresJob advantages:・Ability to speak Japanese and/or Chinese Mandarin is a great advantage.・Experience teaching any languagesWe offer:・Monthly Incentive, Teacher Support Program and other perksSalary:More than 2,600 RON a monthOther info:You can work at your home through Skype at your most convenient time. You don't need to work every day but you are encouraged to work on a Sundays as it is the peak day of our teaching service. You can work as long as you want because we are open 24 hours
title: Online English teacher
